features: 💦【Compatible with Swiffer Power Mop】Compatible with both swiffer power mop, these swiffer power mop refill pads are also compatible with other 15 Inches microfiber spray mop, not fit for swiffer wet jet mop. These power mop pads are very easy to use, simply sticks them to the velcro on the swiffer power mop bottom and then you could start cleaning.

💦【Reusable and Save Your Money 】These reusable power mop refills for swiffer power mop are machine washable and can be wash up to 150+ times. One reusable refill pad is equal to 100+ disposable mop cloths, you needn't rely on expensive disposable mop cloths any more. Just choose our mop pads refills, save a lot of money for you every year and reduce waste for the earth.

💦【High-Quality Material Pads 】Our reusable power mop refill pads are made from durable, absorbent material that will effectively clean your floors without scratching or smearing your delicate floor surfaces. Which contains 4 PCS reusable mop refill pads for swiffer power mop, each with a size of 15.7 * 5.1 inch.

💦【Safe on All Floor Types 】Our power mop pads are incredibly versatile and suitable for use on all floor types, including laminate, hardwood, tile, marble, and vinyl. They are also effective in cleaning windows, walls, and ceilings. Whether you need to sweep or mop, these pads work effectively in both wet and dry conditions.

💦【Wet and Dry Use 】These reusable pads for swiffer power mop can be used not only dry but also wet. For dry use, the thicken microfiber pads can easily remove dust and absorb hair. For wet use, it can easily remove water stains, oil stains, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well they do as I expect them to do, no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is a must have! It’s good quality, cleans the floor great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very fuzzy, absorbs a lot
reviews.reviewText: Yicotira Reusable Power Mop Refill Pads for Swiffer Power Mop Starter KitThese are easy to stick on my wet swifter mop that uses velcro type securing. I love that once dirty, you just take off and can wash it and reuse it instead of wasting money on the disposable kind. More laundry but in the long run, it'll save you bunches. They absorb very nicely with them being cloth and so fuzzy and does a good job on hard spots too. You can't go wrong getting these and I'd recommend to anyone with the wet mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These make a great replacement to the disposable pads. You’re not just saving money but also helping create less waste. I honestly prefer this replacement over the disposable. It has great pile and absorption leaving your floors so clean. It sticks on the mop well, no curled up corners yet. They held up good during the first wash and hopefully they continue to. I did place them in a towel and under some weight to dry, just to help it keeps it’s shape. Still a more sustainable option than disposable when you consider price and the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't toss that mop pad!
reviews.reviewText: Imagine a reusable mop pad that's like a renegade tearing through the mundane haze of multi-surface floor cleaning. Swiffer-compatible, it's not here to conform but to overthrow the non-disposable regime.In the wild dance of mopping, this reusable pad is your rebel accomplice. It doesn't just clean; it's a revolution against the throwaway culture, a middle finger to the one-hit wonders of disposable mop pads. It's the outlaw of cleanliness, leaving a trail of eco-conscious rebellion in its wake.As you glide this pad across your floor of any smooth material you can imagine, it's a trip – a journey into the heart of sustainability. It's not just a mop pad; it's a declaration, a gonzo manifesto against the wasteful norms of our cleaning rituals. So, buckle up, because this reusable mop pad isn't just wiping away grime; it's wiping away the old order, leaving behind a trail of cleaner floors and a hint of rebellion in the air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good reusable pad for Swiffer Power Mop
reviews.reviewText: These work well. The Velcro fits nicely and strongly adheres to the power mop. I have used both laminate and wood flooring and the mop pad did not scratch, picked up dirt extremely well, and was highly absorbent. The strong absorbency helps the floor dry more quickly, which is an added bonus.I have not yet washed the pads and given no instructions on how to care for the pads, I plan on washing in a laundry bag to extend the life. We have a relatively small kitchen area we mop regularly, and a quick rinse has been enough to keep the pad going without needing a full wash. In addition to these working so well, they will save you money by being reusable and are better for the environment than the disposable power mop pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with my Swiffer mop
reviews.reviewText: I like that these are long lasting mop pads. They can go in the washing machine if needed. They fit Swiffer PowerMop, and they work well as expected. Good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much More Sustainable!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking at various ways to swap for more sustainable products around my home and this was one of the easiest swaps.In the past, we would buy those swiffer mop pads, use them once and toss after. This is so much more sustainable and even more cost effective!This set includes a 2-pack of microfiber mop heads that easily attach to your already existing swiffer mop. You can use the mop multiple times before throwing in the washer. Washes well and ready to use right after!So glad I ordered these!
